title: Lucas Ryan Versus
description: The life and times of the worlds newest hero, Lucas Ryan! Madison Daniel unleashes a sci-fi adventure for the next generation. Music, monsters, other worlds...Lucas Ryan will save us all.You will believe.Newest series from YA author, Madison Daniel.Video games. Detention. Crushes. The end of the world. Your basic tale of the unlikeliest hero. Lucas Ryan SAVES!Coming in 2013!!!
author: Madison Daniel
